channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024010671
item.description:
Report X-2024010671

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin upon arrival and sent to QA where it was later taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: Loose cap and failed inner seal on 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
